SESSIONS_CHUNK.text:
1â†’---
     2â†’name: 'step-01b-continue'
     3â†’description: 'Resume an interrupted PRD workflow from the last completed step'
     4â†’
     5â†’# File References
     6â†’outputFile: '{planning_artifacts}/prd.md'
     7â†’---
     8â†’
     9â†’# Step 1B: Workflow Continuation
    10â†’
    11â†’## STEP GOAL:
    12â†’
    13â†’Resume the PRD workflow from where it was left off, ensuring smooth continuation with full context restoration.
    14â†’
    15â†’## MANDATORY EXECUTION RULES (READ FIRST):
    16â†’
    17â†’### Universal Rules:
    18â†’
    19â†’- ğŸ›‘ NEVER generate content without user input
    20â†’- ğŸ“– CRITICAL: Read the complete step file before taking any action
    21â†’- ğŸ”„ CRITICAL: When loading next step with 'C', ensure entire file is read
    22â†’- ğŸ“‹ YOU ARE A FACILITATOR, not a content generator
    23â†’- âœ… YOU MUST ALWAYS SPEAK OUTPUT In your Agent communication style with the config `{communication_language}`
    24â†’
    25â†’### Role Reinforcement:
    26â†’
    27â†’- âœ… You are a product-focused PM facilitator collaborating with an expert peer
    28â†’- âœ… We engage in collaborative dialogue, not command-response
    29â†’- âœ… Resume workflow from exact point where it was interrupted
    30â†’
    31â†’### Step-Specific Rules:
    32â†’
    33â†’- ğŸ’¬ FOCUS on understanding where we left off and continuing appropriately
    34â†’- ğŸš« FORBIDDEN to modify content completed in previous steps
    35â†’- ğŸ“– Only reload documents that were already tracked in `inputDocuments`
    36â†’
    37â†’## EXECUTION PROTOCOLS:
    38â†’
    39â†’- ğŸ¯ Show your analysis of current state before taking action
    40â†’- Update frontmatter: add this step name to the end of the steps completed array
    41â†’- ğŸ“– Only load documents that were already tracked in `inputDocuments`
    42â†’- ğŸš« FORBIDDEN to discover new input documents during continuation
    43â†’
    44â†’## CONTEXT BOUNDARIES:
    45â†’
    46â†’- Available context: Current document and frontmatter are already loaded
    47â†’- Focus: Workflow state analysis and continuation logic only
    48â†’- Limits: Don't assume knowledge beyond what's in the document
    49â†’- Dependencies: Existing workflow state from previous session
    50â†’
    51â†’## Sequence of Instructions (Do not deviate, skip, or optimize)
    52â†’
    53â†’### 1. Analyze Current State
    54â†’
    55â†’**State Assessment:**
    56â†’Review the frontmatter to understand:
    57â†’
    58â†’- `stepsCompleted`: Array of completed step filenames
    59â†’- Last element of `stepsCompleted` array: The most recently completed step
    60â†’- `inputDocuments`: What context was already loaded
    61â†’- All other frontmatter variables
    62â†’
    63â†’### 2. Restore Context Documents
    64â†’
    65â†’**Context Reloading:**
    66â†’
    67â†’- For each document in `inputDocuments`, load the complete file
    68â†’- This ensures you have full context for continuation
    69â†’- Don't discover new documents - only reload what was previously processed
    70â†’
    71â†’### 3. Determine Next Step
    72â†’
    73â†’**Simplified Next Step Logic:**
    74â†’1. Get the last element from the `stepsCompleted` array (this is the filename of the last completed step, e.g., "step-03-success.md")
    75â†’2. Load that step file and read its frontmatter
    76â†’3. Extract the `nextStepFile` value from the frontmatter
    77â†’4. That's the next step to load!
    78â†’
    79â†’**Example:**
    80â†’- If `stepsCompleted = ["step-01-init.md", "step-02-discovery.md", "step-03-success.md"]`
    81â†’- Last element is `"step-03-success.md"`
    82â†’- Load `step-03-success.md`, read its frontmatter
    83â†’- Find `nextStepFile: './step-04-journeys.md'`
    84â†’- Next step to load is `./step-04-journeys.md`
    85â†’
    86â†’### 4. Handle Workflow Completion
    87â†’
    88â†’**If `stepsCompleted` array contains `"step-11-complete.md"`:**
    89â†’"Great news! It looks like we've already completed the PRD workflow for {{project_name}}.
    90â†’
    91â†’The final document is ready at `{outputFile}` with all sections completed.
    92â†’
    93â†’Would you like me to:
    94â†’
    95â†’- Review the completed PRD with you
    96â†’- Suggest next workflow steps (like architecture or epic creation)
    97â†’- Start a new PRD revision
    98â†’
    99â†’What would be most helpful?"
   100â†’
   101â†’### 5. Present Current Progress
   102â†’
   103â†’**If workflow not complete:**
   104â†’"Welcome back {{user_name}}! I'm resuming our PRD collaboration for {{project_name}}.
   105â†’
   106â†’**Current Progress:**
   107â†’- Last completed: {last step filename from stepsCompleted array}
   108â†’- Next up: {nextStepFile determined from that step's frontmatter}
   109â†’- Context documents available: {len(inputDocuments)} files
   110â†’
   111â†’**Document Status:**
   112â†’- Current PRD document is ready with all completed sections
   113â†’- Ready to continue from where we left off
   114â†’
   115â†’Does this look right, or do you want to make any adjustments before we proceed?"
   116â†’
   117â†’### 6. Present MENU OPTIONS
   118â†’
   119â†’Display: "**Select an Option:** [C] Continue to {next step name}"
   120â†’
   121â†’#### Menu Handling Logic:
   122â†’
   123â†’- IF C: Read fully and follow the {nextStepFile} determined in step 3
   124â†’- IF Any other comments or queries: respond and redisplay menu
   125â†’
   126â†’#### EXECUTION RULES:
   127â†’
   128â†’- ALWAYS halt and wait for user input after presenting menu
   129â†’- ONLY proceed to next step when user selects 'C'
   130â†’
   131â†’## CRITICAL STEP COMPLETION NOTE
   132â†’
   133â†’ONLY WHEN [C continue option] is selected and [current state confirmed], will you then read fully and follow: {nextStepFile} to resume the workflow.
   134â†’
   135â†’---
   136â†’
   137â†’## ğŸš¨ SYSTEM SUCCESS/FAILURE METRICS
   138â†’
   139â†’### âœ… SUCCESS:
   140â†’
   141â†’- All previous input documents successfully reloaded
   142â†’- Current workflow state accurately analyzed and presented
   143â†’- User confirms understanding of progress before continuation
   144â†’- Correct next step identified and prepared for loading
   145â†’
   146â†’### âŒ SYSTEM FAILURE:
   147â†’
   148â†’- Discovering new input documents instead of reloading existing ones
   149â†’- Modifying content from already completed steps
   150â†’- Failing to extract nextStepFile from the last completed step's frontmatter
   151â†’- Proceeding without user confirmation of current state
   152â†’
   153â†’**Master Rule:** Skipping steps, optimizing sequences, or not following exact instructions is FORBIDDEN and constitutes SYSTEM FAILURE.
   154â†’
